data.actual_result: If the "member profile" is too high and touch the upper part of the window, it get stucks
data.short_description: When a "member profile" is shown (from the server memberlist) from a member that has a rich presence activity if the window is to small, the "member profile" gets stuck
data.steps_to_repro: - Reduce your window size - Click on any person that has a rich presence activity at the top of the memberlist - Resize your window to full screen
